after graduating with a business and

diego that has flourished for 27 years

spelling the name kryon in session
timidly the first kryon writings were
presented to the metaphysical community
in del mar california and the rest is
history
with a total of six metaphysical books
being released in a four-year span
there are now over a quarter of a
million books in print over seven
language worldwide
lee and his partner jan started the cry
on light group in del mar in 1991
and quickly moved from a living room
setting to a del mar church
now they are hosting meetings all over
the globe with audiences of up to a
thousand people
cryon has the largest consistent new age
folder in the history of american online
and attracts many more electronic

the national cryon quarterly magazine
was started in 1995.
this new age full color 40 page
periodical without any advertising
now has over 3 500 subscribers in over
12 countries
in 1995 lee was asked to present his
work at the united nations
before a un chartered group known as the
society for
enlightenment and transformation or seat
the meeting was so well accepted he was
brought back for a second new york visit
the connection with hay house is a
strong one and promises more to come
lee continues to write inspired stories
and parables from his home in san diego
a quick note from the narrator i have
spent the last eight years of my life
researching
locating publishing and narrating lost
spiritual classics
and making them available to those of
like mind on the internet
i will often find books and then contact
their respective organizations for
permission to narrate and share their
works
and in ninety five percent of the cases
my request is denied
my benchmark for working with what i
feel are important spiritual works
are that they be timeless their message
should be as relevant now as it is going
to be in 50 years
and secondly that the channel or author
is willing to share with the world
that is one of the things that impressed
me when i found kryon teachings years
ago
one of the first things i read was his
remark to lee that these lectures and
channeling
should nay must be available to
individuals worldwide with no
exceptions and at no cost
i had the journey home on my desk for
years
kept getting internal nudges to read it
and finally picked it up
and i thought i would write cryon's
website for a note for permission
i was fully aware of how busy lee's
schedule was
and was not expecting a response for
weeks or even ever
to my delight and pleasant surprise lee
responded the next day and gave full
permission
i personally do not believe in
coincidences after finishing the book
i now realize how important of a message
it is for the world and for the
individual
i want to personally thank mr lee
carroll and kryon
for the opportunity and trust to help
spread the word of love
and of kryon in what little way i can
i truly hope you enjoy listening to the
book as much as i enjoyed narration
thank you and namaste
you
